My Journey As A Developer

In order to keep myself accountable, I've decided to include a blog section on my website. This will provide myself, as well as others some insight into the path I've taken and hopefully act as a resource to newer developers who are looking to take the same path. The posts contained within are about my own struggles as I learn, things that have helped me along the way and also just random thoughts about my journey into the (for me) unknown.

Posts

  • Niche Down! - May 23, 2018


    I've been researching on what makes a good programmer, and have found a few things that are worth sharing. Check them out in this post!
  • My First Game - May 8, 2018


    I've been working on a simple Android game! You can read about my progress so far right here.
  • No Zero Days - April 28, 2018


    An update about my progress with Java so far, my motivation for moving forward, and a couple new resources I've found.
  • The Next Step - April 19, 2018


    I've made a major decision on the direction I'm taking my life! Read all about it here.
  • Welcome Back - April 6, 2018


    Been a little bit since I've done anything with my website! Check out this post to read what I've been up to!
  • Blog Initiated - June 30, 2017


    Welcome to my Blog! It has taken me a little while to get it up and running, as I have had to learn how to implement it properly with Jekyll. Actually, at the time of writing this, I still have to figure it out! It's coming along though, not super complicated.
